availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Hall Adams. Father of James Adams, Elijah T. Adams, Maggie Bell Adams, George M. Adams, and Fannie G. Adams. Hotel keeper Henry County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, pp. 353-354.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 178A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Pleasureville Precinct, p. 364A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994038, Henry County Births.
